name: @bitcoin-computer/nakamotojs
description: Client-side Bitcoin and Litecoin JavaScript library

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && npm run formatjs && npm run build:tests
scripts.coverage: npm run build && npm run nobuild:coverage
scripts.coverage:html: npm run build && npm run nobuild:coverage:html
scripts.coverage:report: npm run build && npm run nobuild:coverage:report
scripts.format:ci: npm run prettier -- --check && npm run prettierjs -- --check
scripts.nobuild:coverage: npm run build:tests && nyc --check-coverage --branches 80 --functions 80 --lines 80 mocha && npm run clean:jstests
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run format:ci && npm run lint && npm run nobuild:coverage
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npm run format:ci && npm run lint && npm run nobuild:integration
scripts.test:integration:show: npm run test:integration | tee nakamotojs-integration-test.log; if [ ${PIPESTATUS[0]} -ne 0 ]; then open nakamotojs-integration-test.log; fi
scripts.test:show: npm run test:unit:show && npm run test:integration:show
scripts.test:unit:show: npm run test 2>&1 | tee nakamotojs-test.log; if [ ${PIPESTATUS[0]} -ne 0 ]; then open nakamotojs-test.log; fi
scripts.unit: npm run build && npm run nobuild:unit
